channel.title: Help how to edit item stats

item.title: Help how to edit item stats
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Your Dragon Claws probably don’t even follow an accurate or calculated Formula. They’re most likely randomized based on a few select factors (if any).

Read full topic
item.source: Help how to edit item stats

item.title: Help how to edit item stats
item.dc:creator: @pthnmj pthnmj
item.description:
@pthnmj wrote:

Assuming by the attempt to acknowledge your request, is what you are looking for is (Attack, Slash, Crush, Strength) Bonuses?

If so … Locate the file by going to your source (where you run the server), in the search bar, type -> item.cfg… You will see either one of two things /bin/item.cfg or some other fold with item.cfg, depending on the source files that came with your source.

You want the one that is not in BIN…

Open it and locate Dragon_Claws <— Type that exactly with the “_”… I am not going to spoon feed all the numbers, but when you login to your server equip the claws, and note the bonus numbers to figure out which numbers affect which bonus…

Hope this qualitative post helped you other than the guy above me “Lol… this is wrong file.”

Read full topic
item.source: Help how to edit item stats

item.title: Help how to edit item stats
item.dc:creator: @jojosox jojosox
item.description:
@jojosox wrote:

im trying to fix claws stats, on zenith source, but bonuses are in IB file
and i did find them but idk what it means, sorry im noobish and new to this

looks like this:

case 14484: // d claws player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(10961)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(1950)); int hit1 = getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 1.0, true); int hit2 = hit1 == 0 ? getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 1.0, true) : hit1; if (hit1 == 0 && hit2 == 0) { int hit3 = getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 1.0, true); if (hit3 == 0) { int hit4 = getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 1.0, true); if (hit4 == 0) { delayNormalHit(weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit1), getMeleeHit(player, hit2)); delayHit(1, weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit3), getMeleeHit(player, 1)); } else { delayNormalHit(weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit1), getMeleeHit(player, hit2)); delayHit(1, weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit3), getMeleeHit(player, (int) (hit4 * 1.5))); } } else { delayNormalHit(weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit1), getMeleeHit(player, hit2)); delayHit(1, weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit3), getMeleeHit(player, hit3)); } } else { delayNormalHit(weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit1), getMeleeHit(player, hit1 == 0 ? hit2 : hit2 / 2)); delayHit( 1, weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit(player, hit1 == 0 ? hit2 / 2 : hit2 / 4), getMeleeHit(player, hit2 / 4)); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help how to edit item stats
